[[Image:Standard of Grenade after Cresques Atlas s XIV.svg|22px]] [[Emirate of Granada]] | commander1 =[[Pedro de Menezes, 1st Count of Vila Real|Pedro de Menezes]] | commander2 = [[Abu Said Uthman III]] | strength1 = | strength2 = | casualties1 = | casualties2 = | campaignbox = {{Moroccan-Portuguese conflicts}} }} The '''Siege of Ceuta''' of 1419 (sometimes reported as 1418) was fought between the besieging forces of the [[Marinid dynasty|Marinid Sultanate of Morocco]], led by Sultan [[Abu Said Uthman III]], including allied forces from the [[Emirate of Granada]], and the Portuguese garrison of Ceuta, led by [[Pedro de Menezes, 1st Count of Vila Real]]. After the loss of the city in a surprise attack in 1415, the Sultan gathered an army four years later and besieged the city. The Portuguese gathered a fleet under the command of princes [[Henry the Navigator]] and [[John of Reguengos]] to relieve Ceuta. According to the chroniclers, the relief fleet turned out to be quite unnecessary. In a bold gambit, D. Pedro de Menezes led the Portuguese garrison in a sally against the [[Marinid]] siege camp and forced the lifting of the siege before the relief fleet even arrived.Quintella, 1839, ''Annaes da Marinha Portugueza'', vol. 1 Blamed for losing Ceuta, the [[Marinid]] sultan was assassinated in a coup in [[Fes, Morocco|Fez]] in 1420, leaving only a child as his heir. Morocco descended into anarchic chaos, as rival pretenders vied for the throne and local governors carved out regional fiefs for themselves, selling their support to the highest bidder.Julien, Charles-André Julien, Histoire de l'Afrique du Nord, des origines à 1830, édition originale 1931, réédition 1961, Payot, Paris, p.195-96 The political crisis in Morocco released the pressure on Ceuta for the next few years. ==Notes== {{reflist}} {{coord missing|Morocco}} {{Ceuta}} {{Clear}} [[Category:Conflicts in 1418]] [[Category:Conflicts in 1419]] [[Category:History of Ceuta]] [[Category:Sieges involving the Emirate of Granada|Ceuta 1419]] [[Category:Portuguese colonisation in Africa]] [[Category:1418 in Africa]] [[Category:1419 in Africa]] [[Category:1418 in Portugal]] [[Category:1419 in Portugal]] [[Category:Sieges involving Portugal]] [[Category:Battles involving Morocco]] [[Category:15th century in Morocco]] [[Category:15th century in Al-Andalus]] {{Portugal-hist-stub}} {{Morocco-stub}} {{Plazadesoberanía-stub}}
